message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $8500?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $9000. What do you think?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $8200?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $8800. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I still think I can do better. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $8000?
